q: La Repubblica after 54 percent of the workers at the Turin facility, also known as Mirafiori, approved the deal. Sergio Marchionne said he wanted to introduce profit-sharing plans for Fiat's Italian workers, while stressing we have to make profits( at the plants), before we can share them. The car manufacturer met fierce opposition from the Italian General Confederation of Labor and its engineering workers' arm over the Turin agreement, which union officials said they considered an attack on labor rights. Tony Dungy said. Hear the entire interview in this CBS Philly SportsPod... Tony Dungy says he truly marveled over some of the things Michael Vick was able to do this season for the Eagles. He was calm in the pocket, he was hitting second, third, fourth receivers, throwing the ball well and just being in command of things. And then still with that ability to escape and get away from the rush and make plays out of nothing, Tony Dungy told KYW Newsradio. A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. Louis Walsh is skeptical that Simon Cowell will really get married. In a December 2010 interview on`` The Graham Norton Show,'' Louis Walsh said why he does not think a Simon Cowell wedding will really happen: Simon Cowell is in love with himself; everybody knows that. He hasn't got time for anyone else.
